title: Share of population with mental disorder
subtitle: Share of population with any mental health or development disability disorder, not including alcohol or [drug use disorders](#dod:drug_use_disorder). This share has been age-standardized assuming a constant age structure to compare prevalence between countries and through time. Figures attempt to provide a true estimate (going beyond reported diagnosis) of prevalence based on medical, epidemiological data, surveys and meta-regression modelling.
